reviews.review_msg: Take a class from this prof if you want something interesting and moderately challenging. He assigns a lot of reading, but it's all stuff that is worthwhile and he marks fairly. Also, his comments on assignments are generally quite helpful. With appropriate warnings as to reading required, I would definitely recommend.
I agree with the comments I've seen. I never thought I'd be interested in modern Italian history (and film). Then I took a class with the Professore. Now I can't get enough. Highly recommended!

He makes participation a massive component of the final grade and then crushes any opportunity for people to participate by answering his own questions. He doesn't know how to end his class . The amount of reading he assigns is ridiculous, and his feedback for assignments is lacking. He seems like a nice person, but avoid him as an instructor.
